Title: S7 Ep. 292 Eileen Belastock - EdTech Consultant Focused on Equity, Accessibility, and Cybersecurity
Description:
I met Eileen Belastock in 2022 at the Future of Educational Technology Conference (FETC) in 2022. We were sitting in the Press Room of the event and shared our love for learning and educational technology.  Eileen is a recognized edtech authority with clients to answer the increasing critical student safety, data privacy, and cybersecurity questions. In this episode she will share a wealth of books that are a must read. One of them is by Kevin Kelly, entitled The inevitable: Understanding  the12 technological forces. https://kk.org/books/the-inevitable.  She is a warm and open leader that is recognized by her peers as someone that others should know.  We hope you enjoy this episode and share it with your colleagues and friends. Be sure to reach out to Eileen also and share you heard her interview on The Intern Whisperer podcast.
